thread.title: Mother says she is happier than ever after gaining 50lbs | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Mother says she is happier than ever after gaining 50lbs | Daily Mail Online

author: Miranda Bryant For Dailymail.Com
title: Mother says she is happier than ever after gaining 50lbs | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad 'The waify girl of my dreams now lives inside my chin': Mother says she is happier than ever after she stopped trying to be skinny and GAINED 50lbs Rachael Flanery said she is 'the happiest Iâ€™ve ever been' after she stopped focusing on trying to stay thin The teacher, writer and actress from Minneapolis, Minnesota, said she considers herself 'fat' since she stopped watching her weight but she is also happier At her thinnest, the 38-year-old, who has two children with her husband Casey, also 38, was between a size two and a size four. Now she is a size eight Her joy is now rooted in her career, her family, her husband and engaging in hobbies that make her happy Published: 22:32 GMT, 16 February 2017 | Updated: 22:32 GMT, 16 February 2017 257 shares
